title: WhatsApp-style UI restyle (RTL) for app shell, tabs, and sections

requirements.summary: Restyle global app shell (light background, compact header, centered content) while preserving RTL behavior
acceptanceCriteria: The app background uses a light, neutral tone similar to the screenshot and the main content appears centered with comfortable spacing on desktop widths.
Header height/spacing is compact and consistent across all tabs (PDF Upload, Sensitive Words, Order Tracking).
RTL remains enabled at the app root and all layouts continue to render correctly in RTL.

file_operations.description: Update the global shell layout to better match the screenshot: compact top bar spacing/typography, a centered content column with max-width and generous whitespace, and consistent container padding across tabs while keeping dir="rtl" at the root.
Adjust global theme tokens and base styles to achieve a clean light neutral background and soft surfaces that match the screenshot; keep RTL-friendly base typography and direction rules intact.
If needed to match the screenshot precisely, refine Tailwind theme extensions (e.g., container widths, border radius, shadow presets, or semantic color tokens) used by the updated shell styles.

requirements.summary: Restyle tab navigation to pill-style segmented control with clear active state, without changing functionality or editing shadcn/ui sources
acceptanceCriteria: Tabs render as rounded/pill-like triggers with a clear selected state (background + text contrast) and subtle unselected styling.
Tab navigation remains keyboard-accessible and switching tabs does not break existing content rendering.
No changes are made to the underlying shadcn/ui component sources under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose styles via className/wrappers only).

file_operations.description: Compose pill/segmented styling by adjusting className on TabsList and TabsTrigger (rounded container, subtle border, active state contrast) while keeping the same tab values/destinations and preserving keyboard accessibility. Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
Add/adjust any global utility layer overrides needed for the pill tabs appearance (e.g., focus ring consistency in RTL) without touching shadcn/ui component source files.

requirements.summary: Restyle PDF Upload screen with a prominent upload card and large dashed drop-zone + primary CTA, keeping upload/scanning behaviors and separating scan results
acceptanceCriteria: The upload area includes a large dashed border drop-zone with centered content (icon + brief instructions + action button) similar to the screenshot.
Existing behaviors remain intact: PDF-only validation, chunked upload progress, retry/resume behavior, and scan controls/results remain available.
Scan results still appear in a separate dedicated section/card and do not replace or hide the upload controls.

file_operations.description: Restructure and restyle the upload UI to match the screenshot: a prominent Card, a larger dashed drop-zone with centered iconography/instructions, and a primary CTA button; keep the existing file input/validation, chunked upload progress, and scan controls. Ensure scan results remain rendered in a separate, clearly delineated Card below the upload card.
Add any global style refinements required by the updated upload drop-zone (e.g., consistent dashed border color, muted background tint, and focus/hover states) while keeping RTL base rules.

requirements.summary: Align card/border/radius/shadow styling and spacing across PDF Upload, Sensitive Words, and Order Tracking without adding new features
acceptanceCriteria: Cards across sections have consistent border, radius, and shadow treatment (soft, minimal) and consistent internal padding.
Tables/forms maintain readability in RTL and remain responsive (no horizontal overflow at common mobile widths except where unavoidable for tables).
Any newly introduced user-facing text added during this restyling work is in English (existing Arabic text can remain unchanged).

file_operations.description: Apply consistent card spacing and soft surface styling (borders/radius/shadows/padding) to the upload card and scan results card; keep tables readable in RTL and avoid unnecessary horizontal overflow.
Align both cards (add + list) to the same soft card styling and spacing as the screenshot; keep the words table responsive and readable in RTL (e.g., allow horizontal scroll only when unavoidable).

Align the orders card, tables, and dialogs with the same soft card styling, consistent padding, and spacing; keep the orders table responsive (overflow-x-auto only at small widths) and ensure RTL readability remains intact.

Introduce/adjust shared styling conventions for cards/surfaces (e.g., consistent shadow strength, border color, radius token) so all three sections visually match and remain consistent across the app.
